alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued May 19 at 7:55PM MDT until May 21 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM MDT FRIDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For both nights, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Wasatch Back and Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 9 AM MDT Friday. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Back
